spatial_accuracy.notes: Room placement is mostly correct, but the W/C and closet upstairs are missing. Wall alignments are generally good, but some wall thickness inconsistencies affect accuracy. Door and window placements have multiple errors, including missing windows and doors, and incorrect door swing directions. Room proportions are somewhat preserved but show minor distortions.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is inconsistent in several areas (E4). Many doors are incorrectly embedded or missing (E1, E2). The adjacency of the W/C and closet above the foyer is incorrect due to missing walls/rooms (E1). The W/C and associated closet in the top-left are missing (E1). Hallucinated elements include a wall segment between the kitchen and dining room (E5) and additional windows.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement accuracy is poor, with many items missing or misplaced (E1, E2). Furniture scale shows inconsistencies; for example, the island in the kitchen appears too small relative to the room (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: The isometric camera is generally correct. Orthographic projection accuracy is fair, but some angles seem slightly off. Lighting quality is flat and lacks depth. Geometry is mostly clean but suffers from inconsistencies in wall thickness. Visual clarity is good due to the simple rendering style.

detected_errors.description: Missing W/C and closet above the foyer.
Missing door to the pantry.
Missing door to the Playroom.
Missing windows in the Dining Room.
Missing door to the main Foyer area.
Missing window in the Living Room.
Incorrect placement and orientation of the Foyer door.
Misplaced bathroom door, and door swing is incorrect (E3).
Kitchen windows are misplaced and not aligned with the floor plan. Too many windows (E5).
Dining room window is misplaced and not aligned.
Incorrect swing direction for the closet door near the stairs.
Incorrect swing direction for the door leading into the area with W/C, closet, and stairs.
Incorrect swing direction for the pantry door.
Inconsistent wall thickness, noticeably thicker in some areas like around the pantry and the stairs.
Proportion distortion of the island in the kitchen.
Hallucinated wall segment between Kitchen and Dining Room.
Hallucinated windows in the Kitchen.
Hallucinated window in the Playroom.
Missing furniture in the W/C and closets.
Furniture in the Playroom is different from the floor plan's indication (counter and sink).
Furniture in the Foyer area is different from the floor plan.
Furniture arrangement in the Living Room is different.
